'''24w03b''' is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on January 18, 2024,<ref>{{snap|24w03b|id=b|January 18, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Experimental ==
These changes only take effect when the [[Update 1.21]] experimental data pack is enabled.

=== Changes ===
==== Non-mob entities ====
'''[[Wind charge]]'''
* Updated the model, texture, and animation, to give it a more dynamic look and feel.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=24w03b
|;From 1.20.3
|266032|Attempting to copy a "Copy of a copy" book in a Crafter behaves incorrectly.
|266577|Some trial spawners in trial chambers spawn mobs without persistence.
|;previous
|267918|The game crashes when opening the configure realms menu.
|267927|The hitboxes of magma cubes are too large.
|267935|Items on top of soul sand or mud will be rendered black.
}}</onlyinclude>
